original_text: and the sash of fine twined linen and of blue and purple and scarlet yarns, embroidered with needlework, as the Lord had commanded Moses.
korean_text: 가는 베 실과 청색 자색 홍색 실로 수 놓아 띠를 만들었으니 여호와께서 모세에게 명령하신 대로 하였더라

sentences.original_text: and the sash of fine twined linen
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 가늘게 꼰 베실로 만든 띠는

sentences.original_text: and of blue and purple and scarlet yarns
as the Lord had commanded Moses
